de.bitbrain.braingdx.behavior.movement

Interface TiledCollisionResolver

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TiledMapAPI

    public interface TiledCollisionResolver
    Resolves collisions on tiled maps.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isCollision(float x, float y, int layer)
      Determines the collision on absolute x and y coordinate
      boolean isCollision(GameObject object, int tileOffsetX, int tileOffsetY)
      Determines the collision of the object with additional horizontal and vertical offset.
      boolean isCollision(int tileX, int tileY, int layer)
      Determines the collision on tiled index and layer.
      boolean isExclusiveCollision(float x, float y, int layer, GameObject object)
      Determines if there is an existing collision on the world position, ignoring the collision caused by an object given.
      boolean isExclusiveCollision(GameObject object)
      Determines if there is an existing collision on the field where the object is, ignoring the self-collision caused by the object given.
      boolean isExclusiveCollision(int tileX, int tileY, int layer, GameObject source)
      Determines the collision on tiled index and layer, excluding the source object.
      boolean isInclusiveCollision(float x, float y, int layer, GameObject object)
      Determines if there is an existing collision on the world position, only for the object provided
      boolean isInclusiveCollision(GameObject object)
      Determines if there is an existing collision on the field where the object is, only for the object provided.
      boolean isInclusiveCollision(int tileX, int tileY, int layer, GameObject source)
      Determines the collision on tiled index and layer, only for the source object.

    • Method Detail

      • isCollision

        boolean isCollision(int tileX,
                  int tileY,
                  int layer)
        Determines the collision on tiled index and layer.
        Parameters:
        tileX - the horizontal tile index
        tileY - the vertical tile index
        layer - the tile layer

      • isExclusiveCollision

        boolean isExclusiveCollision(int tileX,
                           int tileY,
                           int layer,
                           GameObject source)
        Determines the collision on tiled index and layer, excluding the source object.
        Parameters:
        tileX - the horizontal tile index
        tileY - the vertical tile index
        layer - the tile layer
        source - the source to ignore the collision on

      • isInclusiveCollision

        boolean isInclusiveCollision(int tileX,
                           int tileY,
                           int layer,
                           GameObject source)
        Determines the collision on tiled index and layer, only for the source object.
        Parameters:
        tileX - the horizontal tile index
        tileY - the vertical tile index
        layer - the tile layer
        source - the source to check collision for

      • isCollision

        boolean isCollision(float x,
                  float y,
                  int layer)
        Determines the collision on absolute x and y coordinate
        Parameters:
        x - the world x position
        y - the world y position
        layer - the tiled layer

      • isExclusiveCollision

        boolean isExclusiveCollision(GameObject object)
        Determines if there is an existing collision on the field where the object is, ignoring the self-collision caused by the object given.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to check

      • isInclusiveCollision

        boolean isInclusiveCollision(GameObject object)
        Determines if there is an existing collision on the field where the object is, only for the object provided.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to check

      • isExclusiveCollision

        boolean isExclusiveCollision(float x,
                           float y,
                           int layer,
                           GameObject object)
        Determines if there is an existing collision on the world position, ignoring the collision caused by an object given.
        Parameters:
        x - the world x position
        y - the world y position
        layer - the tiled layer
        object - the object to ignore the collision on

      • isInclusiveCollision

        boolean isInclusiveCollision(float x,
                           float y,
                           int layer,
                           GameObject object)
        Determines if there is an existing collision on the world position, only for the object provided
        Parameters:
        x - the world x position
        y - the world y position
        layer - the tiled layer
        object - the object to check collision for

      • isCollision

        boolean isCollision(GameObject object,
                  int tileOffsetX,
                  int tileOffsetY)
        Determines the collision of the object with additional horizontal and vertical offset.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to check for
        tileOffsetX - the horizontal offset
        tileOffsetY - the vertical offset
